name: Jumping Jacks
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a standing position with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
2. Jump your feet out to the sides, so that they are wider than shoulder-width apart, while raising your arms above your head.
3. At the top of the jump, ensure that your body forms an exaggerated 'V' shape, with your arms stretched upwards and your feet out to the sides.
4. Quickly reverse the motion by bringing your feet back together under your body, then lower your arms down to your sides.
5. Continue jumping and raising your arms for the desired duration or number of repetitions.
short_summary: Jumping jacks are a dynamic cardio exercise that works multiple muscle groups simultaneously, performed in an oscillating pattern.
